name: vrchat
author: yunyun
short: VRChat search/profile cog (Dropdown details + author + pin + watchlist)
description: VRChat commands: vrc.help, vrc.uid, vrc.user, vrc.wid, vrc.world, vrc.link, vrc.me, vrc.profile, vrc.watch*, vrc.watchchannel. Includes dropdown detail view, pin detail, show author profile, and watchlist notifications.
install_msg: Loaded! Owner: set credentials with `vrc.setcreds <username> <password>`. Try `vrc.user <name>` / `vrc.world <name>`. Set watch channel with `vrc.watchchannel` then add watchers via `vrc.watch`.
